name: Build 'n Jump
description:
📌 At the beginning of the level, you must build the steel beams by dragging them in a position where you can jump to other platforms and reach the end of the level. 

📌 By pressing C you release steel beams. At this moment game works like a classic platformer. 

❗ In the beginning, the audio is sometimes a little bit laggy.

🕹️ CONTROLS

Movement: arrow keys and space (📌 if you keep space pressed, you jump higher).

Dragging: LMB

PLAYTHROUGH/TUTORIAL
